attributes.action:
Please include the Welsh Dragon on the Union Jack.
This is long overdue!
attributes.additional_details:
Please support this petition.
It would demonstrate to our Welsh brothers and sisters that we are all united during these uncertain times ahead and end this long chapter of hurtful and disrespectful exclusion of one of our important, well loved and culturally rich British nations.
Thank You
attributes.background: It is a much overlooked fact that the Union Jack does not include any elements of the Welsh flag whatsoever. I only realised this when I spoke to a Welsh friend. I am a Londoner living in Wales. Come on let's show the world we are a truly United Kingdom at this time of Brexit and independence talk.
